marklogic.body:
Congratulations to and entire team. This team must be the strongest of all. Coach Sean Foley and caddie Joe LaCava picked up their new job in down time of . They took Heat and often criticized. Hat for their professional ehics and sincerity.
, thank you for your win. You know so many people have been pulling for you all those years. I am very happy for your mother, too. Mothers are Always there for her children. You have great one.
Best wishes! See you soon at Augusta.
